name: 3rd Sankalp Southeast Asia Summit 2017
content: The 3rd edition of Sankalp Summit in Southeast Asia aims at connecting entrepreneurs with investors, corporates and policy makers to facilitate their growth strategies. The summit will bring together diverse stakeholders to deliberate on the building blocks of an integrated and innovation led economy. The three pillars driving these conversations will be Knowledge, Capital and Networks. The second summit will see a cumulative traffic of over 600 ecosystem partners, innovators and entrepreneurs. Across the two days there will be over 12+ enterprise finalists, 20+ showcase booths, 40+ sessions, 50 + speakers and pertinent conversations on impact, investing, innovation and more. With booths showcasing the latest in impact business, enterprise showcase during the Sankalp awards where the best come together, engaging leadership presence and compelling sessions, it will see a significant number of reputed players, corporates, investors and institutions gather to derive the best for the region.
